title: DECSAR Methodology-Applied Training for IT Problem-Solving Skill Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental IT system operations and troubleshooting experience
context.additional_context: Core objective: strengthening immediately applicable problem-solving competencies in professional practice.

learning_goals: Learners can apply each phase of the DECSAR methodology (Define, Explore, Categorize, Solve, Apply, Review) to actual IT problem scenarios.
Learners can execute systematic problem-solving processes with over 80% accuracy in complex IT failure situations.
Learners can demonstrate problem-solving skills under constraints similar to real-world work environments through team-based project execution.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
